>Whats the name of the measure which covers everything which must be 
>tes=
ted, if one wants to test everything.
>
>I mean if bugless tests are writte=
n to the that perfect measure and 
>all test execute green, then there is n=
o bug in the tested code I 
>think.
>
>Is such a perfect measure existing?
=

Well, "number of defects" is a measure of software correctness, but not a =
measure of the much more important concept of software Quality. (Capital "Q=
".) No single measure is sufficient. Weighing a number of measures is the o=
nly way.

Take care.
